snippet: Former world number one Rafael Nadal called time on his 2016 season on Thursday saying he needed to fully recover from the left wrist injury he suffered midway through the year....
lead_paragraph: Former world number one Rafael Nadal called time on his 2016 season on Thursday saying he needed to fully recover from the left wrist injury he suffered midway through the year.

headline.print_headline: Nadal Ends Season to Recover From Left Wrist Injury
headline.main: Nadal Ends Season to Recover From Left Wrist Injury
